data.message: yesterday i was accused of trying to steal an ugly neighbor that i wouldn't touch with a stick, maybe i am not the insecure person maybe I'm just confidant enough for all of you to want to destroy. its also the woman of guys i wouldn't want single. stop fucking the world and making people think its all cheating and drama you fucking twat, its not. there are shit rapist and pedos out there but focusing on me trying to get with some one that hard i would brake a family? people who listen to this are morons.
